name: Sweating Jordan Peele
description: Jordan Peele sweating profusely, used to show extreme nervousness, awkwardness, or tension

text_areas.usage: Primary caption describing the stressful/awkward situation

usage_rules: CONTEXT: Jordan Peele sweating nervously, from a Key & Peele sketch
PRIMARY TEXT: Usually just bottom text describing an awkward or stressful situation
TOP TEXT: Optional - rarely used, only when needed for setup
TONE: Extreme anxiety, nervousness, or uncomfortable tension
BEST FOR: Relatable moments of stress, decision paralysis, or social awkwardness
FORMAT: Often uses 'When...' to describe the situation
cultural_context: From a Key & Peele sketch where Jordan Peele sweats profusely. The meme captures that feeling of extreme nervous tension in everyday situations. It's perfect for those moments where you're internally panicking while trying to appear calm.
text_positioning_note: Most commonly uses only the bottom caption. The sweating face is the main visual element, so text should be concise and not obstruct the expression.
